Find out more. Talk to our Rep.


Contact Us

Logistics

Callbox supports logistics and supply chain solutions providers by developing and implementing strategic b2b lead generation and appointment setting initiatives based on emerging trends, strategies, marketing tools, and industry best practices. We help logistics salespeople maximize their sales time, and focus on selling instead of filling the sales funnel. We generate logistics sales leads through professional telemarketing, targeting their potential customers which might include logistics managers, freight forwarders, customs brokers, and project cargo service providers.

Insurance

We use non-scripted style telemarketing to market various types of insurance policies including Mortgage Guaranty, Life Insurance, Home Insurance, Healthcare Insurance, Auto Insurance, Loan Protection Insurance, Commercial Coverage, and Education Insurance. We assist insurance agents and agencies by helping them build and maintain a font pipeline of insurance sales leads such as commercial, auto, life, final expense, and home insurance leads.

Research and Consulting

Callbox provides marketing leverage to organizations offering research and consulting services including (but not limited to) industry and market analysis, client profiling, business due diligence, financial and forensic analysis, market strategy formulation, and best practice benchmarking. We initiate smart b2b lead generation campaigns to generate research and consulting leads from the financial, healthcare, telecommunications, software, hardware, biotechnology, and other industries from both government and private sectors.

Travel and Tourism

Callbox conducts targeted telemarketing campaign to deliver high-converting travel and tourism leads to travel agencies, tour operators, meeting planners, hotels, bed and breakfasts, and resorts. We design cost efficient lead generation solutions to free up precious time for marketing and customer acquisition, and cut down advertising costs.

Real Estate Management

Callbox generates warm sales leads for real estate managers and companies who provide professional real estate management services. We market a wide range of property management services including legal services, technical management, marketing and leasing, tenant screening, maintenance, and accounting. We seek out real property owners, building managers, and real estate brokers to produce pre-qualified real estate management leads to keep your salespeople busy meeting with clients.

Dial 888.810.7464 to speak with a Callbox representative. You can also set a phone appointment with us through this very short form (we promise, it’s short, 2 minutes, tops) and we’ll call you.
